channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: NOT FIXED! Can you swipe this povement?, 5th November
item.description:
Mess on pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farmers Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ref number 8321469, 5th November
item.description:
I reported an issue regarding a tree on the field at Bursted woods. Please see the above reference number. I gave what3words cordinates and in the past you have responded quickly. Your automated reply says I'll get an update within five days but that hasn't happened. I wondered if anyone has looked into the matter yet as the cage is still surrounding the tree?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More household rubbish dumped, 5th November
item.description:
Yet again more household rubbish dumped on pavement causing an obstruction, this property continues to think its OK to dump their crap with no concern or care.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edwards Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street not cleaned for a month, 5th November
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: The street cleansing and verges have not been done for over a month. This is not Acceptable anymore why is no managers overseeing this to make sure it's done . It seems that the end of the road where I live always gets left out . I have to report this on a regular basis and I should not have to . I did see a big truck last week come and move the leafs to the side of the road and that's it • What action (if any) would you like us to take? For the Street cleaning and verges to be done when they are supposed to be done
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Wateringbury Close, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another day, this waste still there!, 5th November
item.description:
Cleaning Streets need to be done over nights!!!! Disgusting to live dirty, unhygienic place like this!!! Council you should resigne, you can not manage how to clean streets ???

item.title: Fly Tipping, Hutchins Road, Thamesmead, 5th November
item.description:

item.title: Used nappies in gutter, 5th November
item.description:
Charlton Church Lane is very dirty on this side and section. Residents leaving black sacks outside all the time. Today there is rubbish including nappies in the gutter outside 66 Charlton Church Lane. Landlords of these properties need to be fined and the residents educated on rubbish management and disposal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
